name: The Dungeon Tower
description:
Can you beat The Dungeon Tower?


The 10 level of the tower await you in an epic journey full of monsters, traps, quests and relics. Increase your level and become the master hero required to beat the tower. You failed, no worries... the road is difficult but you get bravery points which allow you to get special power ups and try again. It's a roguelike which will grant you hours of fun fighting with the tower and reach the top to beat the Lord!
